languages.text: "Я навожу порядок в этом пиратском гнезде. Почуяв скорое возмездие, несколько богохульников подняли мятеж, и пришлось напомнить им, что всякое благо нам подает милость Императора. В том числе и воздух. Ныне пустующие отсеки будут переданы {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}миссии святого Друза{/g}, как только их герметичность будет восстановлена".

traits.locale_text: "Я навожу порядок в этом пиратском гнезде. Почуяв скорое возмездие, несколько богохульников подняли мятеж, и пришлось напомнить им, что всякое благо нам подает милость Императора. В том числе и воздух. Ныне пустующие отсеки будут переданы миссии святого Друза, как только их герметичность будет восстановлена".

languages.text: "I am setting that pirate den straight. Having sensed the approaching reckoning, a number of blasphemers revolted, and I had to remind them that all that we have are blessings granted to us by the grace of the Emperor. Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."
languages.original_text: "Я навожу порядок в этом пиратском гнезде. Почуяв скорое возмездие, несколько богохульников подняли мятеж, и пришлось напомнить им, что всякое благо нам подает милость Императора. В том числе и воздух. Ныне пустующие отсеки будут переданы {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}миссии святого Друза{/g}, как только их герметичность будет восстановлена".

Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."

languages.text: 「宇宙海賊のアジトを片付けているところだ。報いの時が近づいていると感づいた多くの冒涜者どもは蜂起したため、我らの持ち物はすべからく皇帝の慈悲の賜物だと、奴らに思い出させる必要があった。空気も皇帝の賜物のそのひとつ。船の空きモジュールは再加圧が済み次第、{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}聖ドルスス聖務団{/g}に託す予定だ」
languages.original_text: "I am setting that pirate den straight. Having sensed the approaching reckoning, a number of blasphemers revolted, and I had to remind them that all that we have are blessings granted to us by the grace of the Emperor. Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."

traits.locale_text: 「宇宙海賊のアジトを片付けているところだ。報いの時が近づいていると感づいた多くの冒涜者どもは蜂起したため、我らの持ち物はすべからく皇帝の慈悲の賜物だと、奴らに思い出させる必要があった。空気も皇帝の賜物のそのひとつ。船の空きモジュールは再加圧が済み次第、{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}聖ドルスス聖務団{/g}に託す予定だ」

languages.text: “我正在肃清那群海盗。他们自知末日将近，一部分异端分子妄图造反，于是我不得不提醒他们，我们生命中享受的一切都是神皇的恩典——当然也包括氧气。等那些海盗居住的区域重新增压完毕之后，我会将这些空空荡荡的居住区交给{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}自由处置。”
languages.original_text: "I am setting that pirate den straight. Having sensed the approaching reckoning, a number of blasphemers revolted, and I had to remind them that all that we have are blessings granted to us by the grace of the Emperor. Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."

traits.locale_text: “我正在肃清那群海盗。他们自知末日将近，一部分异端分子妄图造反，于是我不得不提醒他们，我们生命中享受的一切都是神皇的恩典——当然也包括氧气。等那些海盗居住的区域重新增压完毕之后，我会将这些空空荡荡的居住区交给{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}自由处置。”

languages.text: «Estoy imponiendo el orden en esa guarida de piratas. Viendo venir su inminente juicio, varios grupos blasfemos se han rebelado y me he visto obligada a recordarles que todo lo que tenemos es una bendición concedida por la gracia del Emperador. Incluyendo el aire. Los módulos vacíos serán donados a la {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}misión de San Drusus{/g}, una vez sean debidamente represurizados».
languages.original_text: "I am setting that pirate den straight. Having sensed the approaching reckoning, a number of blasphemers revolted, and I had to remind them that all that we have are blessings granted to us by the grace of the Emperor. Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy imponiendo el orden en esa guarida de piratas. Viendo venir su inminente juicio, varios grupos blasfemos se han rebelado y me he visto obligada a recordarles que todo lo que tenemos es una bendición concedida por la gracia del Emperador. Incluyendo el aire. Los módulos vacíos serán donados a la {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}misión de San Drusus{/g}, una vez sean debidamente represurizados».

languages.text: « Ce repaire de pirates est sur la voie de la rédemption. Sentant venir l'heure de leur jugement, certains blasphémateurs se sont révoltés et j'ai dû leur rappeler que tout ce que nous avons nous est accordé par la grâce de l'Empereur, dont l'air que nous respirons. Une fois repressurisés, les modules seront donnés à la {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}mission de Saint Drusus{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "I am setting that pirate den straight. Having sensed the approaching reckoning, a number of blasphemers revolted, and I had to remind them that all that we have are blessings granted to us by the grace of the Emperor. Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."

traits.locale_text: « Ce repaire de pirates est sur la voie de la rédemption. Sentant venir l'heure de leur jugement, certains blasphémateurs se sont révoltés et j'ai dû leur rappeler que tout ce que nous avons nous est accordé par la grâce de l'Empereur, dont l'air que nous respirons. Une fois repressurisés, les modules seront donnés à la {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}mission de Saint Drusus{/g}. »

languages.text: "Ich bringe dieses Piratennest auf Kurs. Als sie die nahende Abrechnung erahnten, haben einige Gotteslästerer revoltiert, und ich musste sie daran erinnern, dass nichts zählt außer den Segen, die die Gunst des Imperators uns gewährt. Und einer dieser Segen ist Luft. Die leeren Module werden der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Mission des Hl. Drusus{/g} übergeben, sobald der Luftdruck wiederhergestellt ist."
languages.original_text: "I am setting that pirate den straight. Having sensed the approaching reckoning, a number of blasphemers revolted, and I had to remind them that all that we have are blessings granted to us by the grace of the Emperor. Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bringe dieses Piratennest auf Kurs. Als sie die nahende Abrechnung erahnten, haben einige Gotteslästerer revoltiert, und ich musste sie daran erinnern, dass nichts zählt außer den Segen, die die Gunst des Imperators uns gewährt. Und einer dieser Segen ist Luft. Die leeren Module werden der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Mission des Hl. Drusus{/g} übergeben, sobald der Luftdruck wiederhergestellt ist."

languages.text: "Korsan yuvasını hâle yola sokuyorum. Köşeye sıkıştığını fark eden birkaç günahkâr isyan etti. Ben de kendilerine, sahip olduğumuz her şeyin İmparator'un bize lütfettiği nimetler olduğunu hatırlatmak zorunda kaldım. Soludukları hava da buna dâhil... Boş modüller, tekrar basınçlandırıldıktan sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Aziz Drusus misyonuna{/g} teslim edilecek."
languages.original_text: "I am setting that pirate den straight. Having sensed the approaching reckoning, a number of blasphemers revolted, and I had to remind them that all that we have are blessings granted to us by the grace of the Emperor. Air being one of them. The empty modules will be given over to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g}, once they are repressurised."

traits.locale_text: "Korsan yuvasını hâle yola sokuyorum. Köşeye sıkıştığını fark eden birkaç günahkâr isyan etti. Ben de kendilerine, sahip olduğumuz her şeyin İmparator'un bize lütfettiği nimetler olduğunu hatırlatmak zorunda kaldım. Hava da dâhil... Boş modüller, tekrar basınçlandırıldıktan sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Aziz Drusus misyonu{/g}na teslim edilecek."
